verses.verse: תְּהִלָּ֗ה <WH8416> [Psalm] of praise לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> David's אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ <WH7311> I will extol אֱלוֹהַ֣י <WH433> God הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> O king וַאֲבָרֲכָ֥ה <WH1288> and I will bless שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> thy name לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> Every י֥וֹם <WH3117> Every day אֲבָרֲכֶ֑ךָּ <WH1288> will I bless וַאֲהַלְלָ֥ה <WH1984> thee and I will praise שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> thy name לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever

גָּ֘ד֤וֹל <WH1419> Great יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <WH1984> to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and greatly וְ֝לִגְדֻלָּת֗וֹ <WH1420> and his greatness אֵ֣ין <WH369> else חֵֽקֶר׃ <WH2714> [is] unsearchable

דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> One לְ֭דוֹר <WH1755> generation יְשַׁבַּ֣ח <WH7623> shall praise מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <WH4639> thy works וּגְב֖וּרֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH1369> thy mighty acts יַגִּֽידוּ׃ <WH5046> to another and shall declare
הֲ֭דַר <WH1926> honour כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> of the glorious הוֹדֶ֑ךָ <WH1935> of thy majesty וְדִבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> works נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH6381> and of thy wondrous אָשִֽׂיחָה׃ <WH7878> I will speak

וֶעֱז֣וּז <WH5807> of the might נוֹרְאֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH3372> of thy terrible acts יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <WH559> And [men] shall speak [וּגְדוּלֹּתֶיךָ כ] (וּגְדוּלָּתְךָ֥ <WH1420> dignity ק) אֲסַפְּרֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5608> and I will declare

זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> the memory רַב־ <WH7227> of thy great טוּבְךָ֣ <WH2898> goodness יַבִּ֑יעוּ <WH5042> They shall abundantly utter וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> of thy righteousness יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> and shall sing

חַנּ֣וּן <WH2587> [is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <WH7349> and full of compassion יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶ֥רֶךְ <WH750> slow אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <WH639> to anger וּגְדָל־ <WH1419> and of great חָֽסֶד׃ <WH2617> mercy

טוֹב־ <WH2896> [is] good יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD לַכֹּ֑ל <WH3605> to all וְ֝רַחֲמָ֗יו <WH7356> to all and his tender mercies עַל־ <WH5921> are over כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <WH4639> [are] over all his works
יוֹד֣וּךָ <WH3034> shall praise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> thee O LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> All מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <WH4639> All thy works וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יךָ <WH2623> and thy saints יְבָרֲכֽוּכָה׃ <WH1288> shall bless
כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> of the glory מַלְכוּתְךָ֣ <WH4438> of thy kingdom יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <WH559> They shall speak וּגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ <WH1369> of thy power יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH1696> and talk

לְהוֹדִ֤יעַ ׀ <WH3045> To make known לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the sons הָ֭אָדָם <WH120> of men גְּבוּרֹתָ֑יו <WH1369> his mighty acts וּ֝כְב֗וֹד <WH3519> and the glorious הֲדַ֣ר <WH1926> majesty מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4438> of his kingdom

מַֽלְכוּתְךָ֗ <WH4438> Thy kingdom מַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> kingdom כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֹֽלָמִ֑ים <WH5769> [is] an everlasting וּ֝מֶֽמְשֶׁלְתְּךָ֗ <WH4475> and thy dominion בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דּ֥וֹר <WH1755> [endureth] throughout all וָדֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> generations

סוֹמֵ֣ךְ <WH5564> upholdeth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַנֹּפְלִ֑ים <WH5307> all that fall וְ֝זוֹקֵ֗ף <WH2210> and raiseth up לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַכְּפוּפִֽים׃ <WH3721> all [those that be] bowed down

עֵֽינֵי־ <WH5869> The eyes כֹ֭ל <WH3605> of all אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> about יְשַׂבֵּ֑רוּ <WH7663> of all wait וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> and You נֽוֹתֵן־ <WH5414> upon thee and thou givest לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> אָכְלָ֣ם <WH400> them their meat בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH6256> in due season

פּוֹתֵ֥חַ <WH6605> Thou openest אֶת־ <WH853> יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> thine hand וּמַשְׂבִּ֖יעַ <WH7646> and satisfiest לְכָל־ <WH3605> of every חַ֣י <WH2416> of every living thing רָצֽוֹן׃ <WH7522> the desire

צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> [is] righteous יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דְּרָכָ֑יו <WH1870> in all his ways וְ֝חָסִ֗יד <WH2623> and holy בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <WH4639> in all his works

קָר֣וֹב <WH7138> [is] nigh יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all קֹרְאָ֑יו <WH7121> unto all them that call לְכֹ֤ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who יִקְרָאֻ֣הוּ <WH7121> upon him to all that call בֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> upon him in truth

רְצוֹן־ <WH7522> the desire יְרֵאָ֥יו <WH3373> of them that fear יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> He will fulfil וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁוְעָתָ֥ם <WH7775> their cry יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> him he also will hear וְיוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <WH3467> and will save

שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <WH8104> preserveth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹהֲבָ֑יו <WH157> all them that love וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> him but all the wicked יַשְׁמִֽיד׃ <WH8045> will he destroy

תְּהִלַּ֥ת <WH8416> the praise יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD יְֽדַבֶּ֫ר־ <WH1696> shall speak פִּ֥י <WH6310> My mouth וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> bless כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בָּ֭שָׂר <WH1320> and let all flesh שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name קָדְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6944> his holy לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever
